"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"We have detected signs of Magatsu
manifesting on planet Harkotan. Due to
its influence, many enemies have
appeared in Shironia. With the Braided
Ash Formation gone, the damage
Magatsu could cause is immeasurable.
All ARKS, scramble and intercept.
――――――――――――――――――――
Destroy the target to clear
Failure: Time limit expires"

"This is... this is terrible.
Are you OK, Sukuna-hime?"
"Thou hast come! Let us defeat this Magatsu together! First, may I trouble thee to eliminate those on the ground?"
"A foul miasma pervades the city. Touching it is dangerous! I beseech thee, be careful!"

"これより、A.I.Sヴェガによる
『禍津』撃破作戦を行います。"

"かつてない強大な反応……
以前の『禍津』よりも警戒が必要です。
お気をつけて！"

"わらわの加護も
その乗り物までは届かんじゃろう……
だが、そなたらの勝利を信じておるぞ！"
